# Task

Write a pig latin transformer called `pig_latinify` that operates on a vector of strings. It iterates over each string and changes it to pig latin. Each iteration should run on a separate thread.



# Data

pig_latinify(["hello", "apple", "strong", "world"])

```julia
using Distributed, Threads

function pig_latinify(words)
    @sync begin
        for (index, word) in enumerate(words)
            @async begin
                new_word = convert_pig_latin(word)
                words[index] = new_word
            end
        end
    end
end

# Function to convert individual words to pig latin
function convert_pig_latin(word)
    vowels = "aeiou"
    
    # Check if word starts with a vowel
    if startswith(word, vowels))
        return "$wordway"
    else
        # Find the index of the first consonant cluster
        for (index, char) in enumerate(word)
            if !ismatch(vowels, char))
                break
        end
        
        # Construct the pig latin form
        return "$(substring(word, 1, index)))$(substring(word, index))ay"
    end
end

# Test data
words = ["hello", "apple", "strong", "world"]

# Run pig_latinify on separate threads
pig_latinified_words = pig_latinify(words)

# Print the result
pig_latinified_words
```
